Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Savant \Sa`vant"\, n.; pl. {Savants} (F. ?; E. ?). [F., fr. savoir to know, L. sapere. See {Sage}, a.] A man of learning; one versed in literature or science; a person eminent for acquirements. [1913 Webster]
savant n : someone who has been admitted to membership in a scholarly field [syn: {initiate}, {learned person}, {pundit}]
